segments.text: I watch as the girl stands there, her hand raised eagerly, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something so innocent in her expectation, and it almost warms my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sight of her standing there while the boy precariously reaches above her makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why do they feel they can get away with this, turning this kitchen into their playground?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to shout a warning, but the joy of their little scheme holds me back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a moment fraught with risk—each passing second deepens the potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: As the water trickles down the cabinets, I am left wondering if the sweetness of the cookies is worth the trouble they’re creating.
segments.speaker: PAR
